title: Best of 2021: At the Seance
description:
As we look ahead to the new year, we want to take one last chance to say thank you for the year that was — and present our "Best of 2021"! Please enjoy this episode from Mediums, one of our favorite new shows of this year, where we take you straight into the heart of a 19th-century seance.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
